mapper.sql: fs_id, fs_type, fs_loan_category, fs_charge_type, fs_rate, fs_min_amount, fs_max_amount, fs_accurate_amount, fs_update_time, fs_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into abc_fee_setting (fs_type, fs_loan_category, fs_charge_type, fs_rate, fs_min_amount, fs_max_amount, fs_accurate_amount, fs_update_time, fs_deleted) values (#{fsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsLoanCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsChargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{fsMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fsMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fsAccurateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), 0)
mapper.select:
select
from abc_fee_setting where fs_type = #{feeType} and fs_loan_category = #{loanCategory} and #{loanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} >= fs_min_amount and #{loanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} <= fs_max_amount and fs_deleted = 0
mapper.update:
update abc_fee_setting
fs_type = #{fsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fs_loan_category = #{fsLoanCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fs_charge_type = #{fsChargeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fs_rate = #{fsRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fs_min_amount = #{fsMinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fs_max_amount = #{fsMaxAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fs_accurate_amount = #{fsAccurateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fs_update_time = now(), fs_deleted = 0
where fs_id = #{fsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and fs_deleted = 0
mapper.delete: update abc_fee_setting set fs_deleted = 1 where fs_id = #{fsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
